title: Tool - Lateralus [24-bit 96kHz HDCD flac] MC Lurken Mix
description:
Tool - Lateralus [24-bit 96kHz HDCD flac] MC Lurken Mix



**MC Lurken Mix featuring custom Izotope Ozone 5 VST (EQ, Dynamics, Imaging, Dither) and 64-bit/384kHz processing. Presented in high resolution 24-bit/96kHz**



A couple months ago I ran across this vinyl rip of Lateralus (http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8261839/TOOL_Lateralus_%28LINN_LP12_vinyl%29_FLAC) posted on a vinyl rip site. In a topic of this rip there was a claim that this was the best version out there. My remaster of Lateralus (http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8085431/Tool_-_Lateralus_-_Custom_Remaster_by_MC_Lurken_24-bit_96kHz_fla) was also brought into the conversation with some people claiming they liked mine better. Knowing I could do better after some recent improvements I have decided to do another version. Lateralus is quickly becoming one of my favorite albums and I hope you all enjoy this new version as much as I do.




1 - The Grudge
2 - Eon Blue Apocalypse
3 - The Patient
4 - Mantra
5 - Schism
6 - Parabol
7 - Parabola
8 - Ticks & Leeches
9 - Lateralus
10 - Disposition
11 - Reflection

13 - Faaip de Oiad
